name: places/ChIJx24_1utYwokR87HxCkRW_w0
adrFormatAddress: 1160 3rd Ave, New York, NY 10065, USA

originalText.text: Highly highly recommend! Chris made the cocktail party go seamlessly! So much delicious food, festive cocktails, and incredible presentation. He and his guy were so nice and efficient, they took care of everything, and you can tell they are professionals— from all the different options to the attention to detail. My guests are still talking about it days later! Absolutely recommend — will be coming up with something else to host just to work with him again!

text.text: Highly highly recommend! Chris made the cocktail party go seamlessly! So much delicious food, festive cocktails, and incredible presentation. He and his guy were so nice and efficient, they took care of everything, and you can tell they are professionals— from all the different options to the attention to detail. originalText.text:
What can I say about Chef Chris and his team? I recently had the pleasure of working with Chris for my wedding weekend out in the east end, and from our initial communication through to the end of the celebration I was truly pleased and impressed. From the moment I first connected with Chris, who was referred to me by a close family friend for whom he has worked for many years, I knew I was in good hands. His attention to detail and easy, relaxed energy truly put me at ease while planning such an important occasion. The attention to detail that he put into crafting each of the menus was obvious from the outset, and before tasting a single creation of his I knew he would deliver. Needless to say he exceeded even my high expectations, serving up a superbly delicious, meticulously executed wedding celebration that left each of my guests blown away. I truly enjoyed the energy he brought to the proceedings, which can best be described as calm, warm and easy, and it was amazing to see he and his team in the kitchen so carefully and easily executing their work. His ability to tailor the menu to suit a myriad of tastes, as well as his genuinely fun, friendly demeanor. As for the food, it  was truly perfect, and I don’t say that lightly. Every dish was flawlessly plated, every bite more delicious than the last.

I would highly, highly recommend Chef Chris for any occasion or event you may be hosting. His professionalism, friendliness, and skill at leaving everyone blown away by what they’ve just eaten is reason enough to seek him out, and I cannot thank him enough for making the most important occasion in mine and my husband’s life thus far that more more memorable due to his incredible talent. I cannot wait to work with him again!

originalText.text: We held an event at our chairman’s home that was catered by Chef Chris and his team. Right from the start, Chef Chris was professional and, overall, a very friendly person to work with. His team was also friendly, personable, and great to work with. The food and setup were amazing, and the guests, especially the host, were very happy with everything. I can confidently say that if we ever have another event like this to organize, Chef Chris and his team will be the first ones we think of.

originalText.text: My husband had the most amazing party for his 50th birthday. Chef Chris suggested menu items for our event which were delicious. All my guests raved about the food. Chef Chris and his staff are the best.

text.text: My husband had the most amazing party for his 50th birthday. Chef Chris suggested menu items for our event which were delicious. All my guests raved about the food. Chef Chris and his staff are the best.

originalText.text: I wanted to have a special dinner for my mom's 80th Birthday and reached out to various chefs I found online.  Chef Chris made the choice very easy!  He was very responsive and professional throughout the whole process.  We had one guest that has dietary restrictions and he created a separate menu for him, which was awesome.  Everything that he served was truly delicious!  I would definitely book him for another event.  His team was amazing as well - very friendly and professional.  I couldn't ask for more!  Thank you Chef Chris, Alex & Brooke for a very memorable night!
